ComicInfo.Summary:
Probe lands in Russia and discovers a land based Death Ray. He destroys the base and rides a cruise missile back to sea.
A man travels back into the past to prehistoric times.
Judge Dredd is sent to the lunar colony Luna1 to spend 6 months as an adviser to their police force, but someone is trying to kill him when he arrives.
